name: Goblin Cave Depths
description: Narrow tunnels open into a larger chamber riddled with crude barricades.

descriptions.first_visit: The air grows stale as you descend. Crude barricades and ratty bedrolls suggest a larger goblin force once camped here.
descriptions.return_visit: You recognize the chamber. The goblins seem fewer now, but danger still lurks.
descriptions.cleared: The once-busy goblin den lies empty. Only the stench remains.

connections.description: A guarded passage leads to a small vault
